      • loginApp

        public User loginApp(java.lang.String username,
                     java.lang.String password)
              throws LoginFailedException
        Tries to log in the user into the application and set him as applicationUser
        Parameters:
        username - the name that the users identify himself
        password - the password from the user in clear-text
        Returns:
        User This returns a object of user if the login function had success
        Throws:
        LoginFailedException - when the userinput dont fit with the database data

      • registerApp

        public User registerApp(java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String email,
                        java.lang.String password)
                 throws UserExistException,
                        EmailExistException,
                        ConnectionErrorException
        Register a new user into the application if the username and email is unique
        Parameters:
        username - the name that the users identify himself
        email - the email adress of a user to contact him
        password - the password from the user in clear-text
        Returns:
        User This returns a object of user if the register and login functions had success
        Throws:
        UserExistException
        EmailExistException
        ConnectionErrorException

      • addService

        public void addService(ServiceType service,
                       java.lang.String name,
                       java.lang.String usertoken)
                throws AddServiceFailException,
                       NoUserLoggedInException
        Inserts a Service into the Database that allows the Connection between User and Service (Like Dropbox)
        Parameters:
        service - is the ServiceType that we want to Save (Dropbox)
        name - is the name of the connection ("My Connection-name")
        Throws:
        AddServiceFailException
        NoUserLoggedInException

                  throws LoadSupportedServicesException

        Throws:
        LoadSupportedServicesException

      • updateService

        public void updateService(CloudService service,
                          java.lang.String newname)
                   throws UpdateServiceErrorException
        This method updates the name of a existing Service-connection
        Parameters:
        service - is the Connection between User and Service that we want to update
        name - is the new name/alias that we want to give this connection
        Throws:
        UpdateServiceErrorException

      • deleteService

        public void deleteService(CloudService service)
                   throws DeleteServiceConnectionErrorException
        Deletes a existing ServiceConnection of a User
        Parameters:
        service - is the Service that we want to remove from db
        Throws:
        DeleteServiceConnectionErrorException

      • updateUserPw

        public void updateUserPw(java.lang.String oldPassword,
                         java.lang.String newPassword)
                  throws UpdateUserPwErrorException
        This function updates the user password for our application
        Parameters:
        user - Is the User that we want to update
        oldPassword - Is the old password that we need to make this update
        newPassword - Is the password that we want to set as current pw
        Throws:
        UpdateUserPwErrorException
